casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Reginald Underwood FULLARD 309P15-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 8, 2017 Kathryn L. VandenBerg, Assistant Appellant Defender, Reginald Fullard, for Fullard, Reginald Underwood. Karen A. Blum, Special Deputy Attorney General, James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th of April 2017 by Defendant for Petition for Direct Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of June 2017."
